headline: Payentry to Provide Employment Verification Through The Work Number® from Equifax
summary: Payentry, a leading provider of payroll and human capital management solutions, today announced it is enabling clients to leverage The Work Number® from Equifax, the industry-leading commercial source of consolidated employment verification. This collaboration gives employees and employers a faster, more secure way to handle employment and income verifications in support of important life events such as applying for a mortgage, an auto loan or government benefits.

headline: 3 Reasons EFX is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Even though Equifax (currently trading at $263.33 per share) has gained 11.8% over the last six months, it has lagged the S&P 500’s 17.5% return during that period. This was partly driven by its softer quarterly results and may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
